name: Dicey Defense (MrSquish)
description:
Made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam with the theme "Roll of the Dice."

Controls: Click and hold to pick up dice, let go to shoot them forward. You get a choice of three dice every few seconds. Stop the chess pieces before they reach your castle. WASD to move and Space to jump. Once a dice lands, it deals AoE damage equal to the number that is face up. Blue dice fire 2x as fast, dice with red dots deal 2x damage. Spell dice can cast either a fire explosion that does high damage or freeze spell that stops enemy movement. Note: the hitboxes for the AoE effects are a fair bit smaller than the vfx make them seem...

Made by AshenDisc and MrSquish.

PS. Sorry about the camera bugging out sometimes. It is only an issue with the WebGL build, and I could not figure out why... :(
